snippet: A White House report on big data has some good ideas, but it falls short of the “clear rules of the road” that were envisioned.
abstract: Editorial approves of recommendations contained in White House report on 'big data' and privacy; holds they could help protect personal information of individuals from warrantless searches and abusive marketing practices but argues they do not go far enough; calls on Obama administration to refine some of the proposals.
lead_paragraph: A White House report on big data has some good ideas, but it falls short of the “clear rules of the road” that were envisioned.

headline.main: A Long Way to Privacy Safeguards
headline.print_headline: A Long Way to Privacy Safeguards
